TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XmlLinkedNode extends System.Xml.XmlNode

Docs.summary: Gets the node immediately preceding or following this node.
Gets the node immediately following this node.
Docs.value: The immediately following this node or if one does not exist.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example displays the first two book nodes.
[!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlLinkedNode.NextSibling Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.xml.xmllinkedno_0_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[Classic WebData XmlLinkedNode.NextSibling Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.xml.xmllinkedno_0_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlLinkedNode.NextSibling Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.xml.xmllinkedno_0_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets the node immediately preceding this node.
Docs.value: The preceding or if one does not exist.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example displays the last two books.
[!code-cs[Classic WebData XmlLinkedNode.PreviousSibling Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.xml.xmllinkedno_1_1.cs)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlLinkedNode.PreviousSibling Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.xml.xmllinkedno_1_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlLinkedNode.PreviousSibling Example#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/p-system.xml.xmllinkedno_1_1.cpp)]
